mapper.select: select * from POSTS order by ID desc
mapper.insert: insert into POSTS (TITLE, CONTENT, AUTHOR) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{author})
mapper.update: update POSTS set TITLE = #{title} , CONTENT = #{content} , MODIFIED_TIME = systimestamp where ID = #{id}

choose.when: SELECT * FROM POSTS WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT * FROM POSTS WHERE UPPER(CONTENT) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT * FROM POSTS WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR UPPER(CONTENT) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT * FROM POSTS WHERE UPPER(AUTHOR) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY ID DESC
